topics.body: You know, sometimes I'm afraid to joke by saying "Ask your mom" or something similar because I wouldn't know whether they have parents or not.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bdc74863687231a6191a00#post_54bdc74863687231a6191a00
Fun Squiggy Fact.
I have a bald spot on my right shoulder. My mom thought it would be funny to put a wax strip there when I was distracted. She slapped it on and at that point my only option was to just rip it off. It's been bare there ever since.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bdc83863687233da411200#post_54bdc83863687233da411200
Well, tell them that you did not know about, so they can't get mad at you.
topics.author: 5239db6da4c72d22d9000358

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bdc84f6368722c9fcb1200#post_54bdc84f6368722c9fcb1200
Wait; so a single wax strip permanently removed your body hair?  Lucky.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
Fun HJSDGCE Fact.

I have a terrible memory, especially names and faces. It took my 2 months to remember the name of my uncle who frequently visits me for so many years. I can't remember the teacher who taught me everything about English, Science and Mathematics. I can't remember half of my friends and I can't even remember my own home address.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bdc83863687233da411200#post_54bdc83863687233da411200
Real talk. You can say what you want about me. You can call me the most awful, vile, horrible names you can imagine, and I'll brush it off. You talk about my mom in any way and I will dedicate the remainder of my life to ruining yours.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
